Something practical yet maintaining appropriate social distance would work well in Venetian society where nobles typically keep their distance from merchants unless there's clear benefit to both parties.I could suggest combining our resources for mutual benefit - perhaps offering a partnership or sharing expertise, framed in terms of maximizing returns on the Calle del Scarlatto land. This maintains authenticity while being gameplay-focused.The response should be short and conversational but contain enough substance to feel like an organic Venetian noble interaction that advances my strategic position.</think>Buongiorno, Signora Vittoria.
